thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 14 of 2268
thread.title: Wilf Brooks

author: Wilf Brooks
title: Wilf Brooks
text: There are no minuses to my experience with the blind I ordered. The quality is excellent, the time to delivery was met and the installation was easy. Due to the size of my velux window, it was a two person job to install it correctly. The price was excellent and I am very pleased with the whole experience and quality of the goods. Strongly recommended.
